frontmatter.title: Global Health Objectives [for WHO]
frontmatter.content: As a sub-branch of the World Health Organization, GHO was focused on creating a professional and helping community around global health initiatives, mainly in Africa. As part of the organizing team for 2 yearly round tables, and also a lead in the online campaigns to gain traction, I've dealt with a marketing-oriented tech stack. As the sole core developer, I built the platform using Jekyll CMS and provided multiple admin panels and dashboards for the team members.
